text: I'm Sadev, a final year computer science engineering student at NMIT Bangalore,
and a passionate full-stick developer who dreams of solving real-world problems with scalable technology.
I specialize in building modular cloud-ready application who's in React,
NXTRA, Node-TRA, Post-Risk, QL, MongoDB, and AWS.
In the strong foundation in logical thinking, data structures, and algorithm,
I focus on creating tech that is not just functional, but also efficient, scalable, and maintainable.
I love crafting projects that combine clean UI with intelligent backing logic to make a real
difference in people's life. I would say that I'm not only a collaborative team there,
but also someone who takes complete ownership of the task from start to finish.
I have often stepped up as a group leader in projects in hackathons, coordinating efforts,
assigning responsibilities, and ensuring reach-level high quality results on time.
I believe in combining teamwork with personal accountability so that I can contribute to
team success while also driving my own work to completion. Most recently, I have completed my
SD internship at GROWAR, where I have worked extensively on both front and back in using
NXTRA's, developed and optimized services for ethics platform, including reading and listing.
Beyond academics, I would say that I give equal importance to health and wellness.
I regularly practice yoga and enjoy playing badminton for stay active and focused.
I'm also passionate about traveling and exploring new destination, as it helps me stay grounded
and creative. Apart from that, I have deep interest in finance and enjoy learning about
stock markets and trading in my free time. Thank you.
